Acknowledgment code

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
AA Original mode: Application Accept - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Acceptfrom v2.1
AE Original mode: Application Error - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Errorfrom v2.1

CA Enhanced mode: Accept acknowledgment: Commit Acceptadded v2.2
